title: Rilke Layout Options Schema
description: Creates a new, generic layout definition in the given or default project.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the layout?

path.description: The path at which to create the NgModule, relative to the workspace root.

route.description: The route path for a module. When supplied adds the child route to that routes.

flat.description: Create the new files at the top level of the current project root.
